metadata.title: CVE-2017-2518 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3.2 isaffected. macOS before 10.12.5 is affected. tvOS before 10.2.1 is affected.watchOS before 3.2.2 is affected. The issue involves the "SQLite"component. It allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause adenial of service (buffer overflow and application crash) via a crafted SQLstatement.

criterions.comment: sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
